seed_pair.known: No me queda nada que decir.
seed_pair.target: I've got nothing left to say.

S0288: A la mayoría de la gente que conozco le gusta ver la televisión.
Most people I know like watching television.
S0289: Me pregunto si ella va a estar allí esta tarde.
I wonder if she's going to be there this afternoon.
S0290: Me pregunto si él sabe la respuesta.
I wonder if he knows the answer.
S0291: I hope I'll be able to speak better soon.
I hope to be able to
S0292: Espero que puedas venir a la fiesta.
I hope you'll be able to come to the party.
I hope you'll be able to
S0293: Tengo que descubrir dónde va a reunirse conmigo.
I have to find out where he's going to meet me.
where he's going to meet me
S0294: No tengo suficiente tiempo para llamarte esta noche.
I don't have enough time to call you tonight.
S0295: No dije que quería terminar en un día.
I didn't say that I wanted to finish in a day.
S0296: Dije que necesitaba un poco más de tiempo.
I said that I needed a little more time.
S0297: No conozco a muchas personas que hablan español.
I don't know many people who speak Spanish.

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs sentences as natural language pattern examples
_instructions.lego_coverage_requirement: Practice phrases MUST use at least 60% of the LEGOs listed in recent_seed_pairs[seed_id][1]
_instructions.vocabulary_source: Prioritize LEGOs from recent_seed_pairs[seed_id][1] + current_seed_legos_available, then any words from sentences
_instructions.overgeneration: Generate 12-15 phrases knowing some may be filtered by GATE validation
_instructions.quality: Semantic meaning + syntactic correctness + pedagogical value
_instructions.format: Array format: ["English phrase", "Spanish phrase", null, lego_count]
